row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PRV.JOB.GET_ARTIFACT.START_DOWNLOAD@GENERIC
row.description: Create and lock artifact folder on target

row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Artifact ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Artifact Base Dir" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Run ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_RUN_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Download Timeout" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Force Download" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_FORCE_DOWNLOAD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Max Number of Artifacts" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_MAX_ARTIFACTS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_ACTION_NAME# = "StartDownloadAction"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPTIONS#, string, 14
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[3] = "-artifactid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[5] = "-base" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[7] = "-runid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_RUN_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[9] = "-timeout" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[11] = "-force" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_FORCE_DOWNLOAD#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[13] = "-maxartifacts" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_MAX_ARTIFACTS#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_ARTIFACT.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** START DOWNLOAD ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** START DOWNLOAD ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.pre_process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.START_STOP_JOB_ACCORDING_TO_AGENT_OS
:PRINT Validate Artifact's Base Dir :PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR#) :IF &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR# <> "" : SET &MISSING_ARTIFACT# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_ID#, "EXT:") :ELSE : SET &MISSING_ARTIFACT# = "Y" :ENDIF
:IF &MISSING_ARTIFACT# = "Y" : PRINT "UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR was not specified, use default location" : SET &CLIENT# = SYS_ACT_CLIENT() : PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR# = STR_CAT("../temp/ara/", &CLIENT#) :ENDIF :PRINT Start download Artifact to folder '&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_BASE_DIR#'

row.post_process:
!Publish the artifact location :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_ARTIFACT_DIR" : PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_DIR# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_ARTIFACT_READY" : PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_READY# = "&VALUE#" : PSET &UC4RB_DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_DIR# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_READY# = "NO" : PSET &UC4RB_DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS# = "NO" :ENDIF
